name: Aminu Fuhad
description: Hello! I'm Aminu Fuhad, a Fullstack Mobile developer with expertise in Flutter, Swift, C#, ASP.NET, Firebase, Docker, SQL, Git, and microservices. I have a strong track record of delivering high-quality mobile solutions across industries like healthcare, HR, developer collaboration, video streaming, and finance. With a Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, I bring analytical and problem-solving skills to create innovative mobile solutions. I'm passionate about technology and available for new opportunities. Let's create something amazing together!
